name: Gravitation Brands
author: Ulises Freitas

sections.description:
Gravitation Brands, is a plugin to display Brands on your site, with ShortCodes, includes a carousel to display images, responsive.
Go to GV. brands , Add New Brand complete the form with Company name, then add a feature Image and your done.
Later go to a post , page or widget and add the shortcode [gravitation_brands].

A brief Markdown Example

Features ShortCodes:

  1. All Brands [gravitation_brands]
sections.installation:
Download and install from WordPress.org.
Configure as you see fit, under Gravitation / Gravitation Brands.
Upload \’gravitation-brands\’ to the \’/wp-content/plugins/\’ directory
Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
Place [gravitaiton_brands] in your templates
sections.changelog:
v1.0

  • Initial

v1.1

  • language folder added, translated to English, Spanish, German, French

v1.2

  • Images size fix on carousel display

v1.3

  • Update notification enhanced with custom message

v1.4

  • Update wp 5.0

v1.5

  • Update wp 5.1

v1.6

  • Update wp 5.2.3
